#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
char clr[][10] = {"black","brown","red","orange","yellow","green","blue","violet","grey","white"};
int calls(char *str)
  {
      for(int i=0;i<10;i++)
      {
              if(strcmp(str,clr[i])==0)
              return i;
              }}
int main()
{   
    char f1[4][10];
    unsigned int ans=0,i;
    cin>>f1[0]>>f1[1]>>f1[2]>>f1[3];
    for(i=0;i<4;i++)
    ans=(ans<<4)+calls(f1[i]);
    printf("%d",ans);
    i=calls(f1[3]);
    while(i--)
    printf("0");
    printf(" Guntur");
    return 0;
    }
